story: It was sunrise in Oldstones,  when our hero met Bran Stark again, and they fought in the final battle. Margaery Tyrell won the duel and took the life of the villain. Finally it was sunrise in Deepwood Motte when Margaery Tyrell was finally safe, and celebrated with Willas Tyrell by throwing a ball.
